      Methods in sk.net that return SKConnection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SKConnection SKClient.getConnection()
      Returns the connection of this client or null if no connection has been established.
      SKConnection SKServer.getConnection(int id)
      Returns the connection associated with the specified id.
      protected SKConnection SKConnection.init(SKPacket packet)
      Sends the session initialization packets between client and server.
      SKConnection SKConnection.sendPacket(SKPacket packet)
      Sends a packet to the end-point of this connection's socket.
      protected SKConnection SKConnection.setClient(SKClient client)
      Sets the client associated with with this connection.
      protected SKConnection SKConnection.setServer(SKServer server)
      Sets the server associated with with this connection.
      Methods in sk.net with parameters of type SKConnection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SKPacketListener.connected(SKConnection connection)
      Called when a new connection is established.
      void SKPacketListener.disconnected(SKConnection connection, boolean local, java.lang.String msg)
      Called when a connection is closed.
      void SKPacketListener.received(SKConnection connection, SKPacket packet)
      Called when an SKPacket is received.
      Constructors in sk.net with parameters of type SKConnection 
      Constructor and Description
      SKCommunicationListener(SKConnection connection)
      Constructs a new communication listener in order to read incoming traffic from the specified connection.
